item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v2.0.2.13
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v2.0.2.13
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 20 Feb 2025 14:39:15 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: Issues:
- Add PPMS.lvlib containing class factory to decouple classes and reduce circular dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v2.0.1.12
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v2.0.1.12
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Thu, 20 Feb 2025 13:53:42 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: Issues:
- Change startup behavior to use QDInstruments local mode if address = "", "127.0.0.1", or "localhost"
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LV-Data-PGSQL v3.9.2.7
item.description:
Product: LV-Data-PGSQL v3.9.2.7
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 17 Feb 2025 13:58:02 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: - Database management and Selects and Insert macros to PostgreSQL/timescaleDB.


Release Notes: [3.9.2]
- Issue #120 fix buttons in PGPASS.ConnectionMgr.vi
- updated dependencies
- Timestamp to SQL Time.vi uses timezone offset rather than UTC offset
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: LV-Data v3.9.2.7
item.description:
Product: LV-Data v3.9.2.7
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 17 Feb 2025 11:55:56 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: - Collection of VIs to write and read files in TDMS, Igor Text (*.itx), and text-based spreadsheet data (*.dat) formats.
- LV graph to Igor Pro and Igor Pro formatters
- Tools are provided for uploading to and downloading from AWS S3

Release Notes: [3.9.2]
- updated package dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v2.0.0.11
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v2.0.0.11
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Mon, 17 Feb 2025 07:39:41 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: Issues:
- #20: new API format (ie, setMagnet instead of Set Magnet)
- #22: Instrument Framework v1.14(.4)
- #23: Update to QDInsrtumetn.dll v1.0.7 enables OptiCool
- #24: Change PPMS3 persistent/driven magnet
- #25: SMO v2/Instrument Framework v2
- #26: Select temperature approach mode (Channel 0: FastSettle, 0: No Overshoot)
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
